name: executesUserLifecycleWithJourney(Quest)
description: Executes the user lifecycle using @Journey to prepare users before the test body runs.
descriptionHtml:
Test Details
PropertyValue
Test NameexecutesUserLifecycleWithJourney
Class NameUserLifecycleEvolutionTest
Class Annotations
@SpringBootTest(,
     args=,
     classes=class io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.TestConfig,
     properties=,
     webEnvironment=NONE)
@Tag(exclude-from-verify)
@API
Method Annotations
@Test
@Regression
@AuthenticateViaApi(type=class io.cyborgcode.api.test.framework.api.authentication.AppAuth,
     credentials=class io.cyborgcode.api.test.framework.api.authentication.AdminAuth)
@PreQuest(
@io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Journey(journeyData={
    @io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.JourneyData( "USER_INTERMEDIATE")
    }  "CREATE_NEW_USER")
@io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Journey(journeyData={
    @io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.JourneyData( "USER_LEADER")
    }  "CREATE_NEW_USER"))
@Description(Executes the user lifecycle using
@Journey to prepare users before the test body runs.)
Test ArgumentsQuest
statusMessage:
[✘ Validation failed: IS (Expected: 201, Actual: 401)] 
Expecting value to be true but was false
statusTrace:
